definition: to ride (a bicycle, horse, motorbike etc)/cycling/horseback riding/motorbike riding/a ride/CL:次[ci4]
to sit astride/to ride (a horse, bike etc)/classifier for saddle horses
row/line/commercial firm/line of business/profession/to rank (first, second etc) among one's siblings (by age)/(in data tables) row/(Tw) column

to walk/to go/to travel/a visit/temporary/makeshift/current/in circulation/to do/to perform/capable/competent/effective/all right/OK!/will do/behavior/conduct/Taiwan pr. [xing4] for the behavior-conduct sense

sentences.english: Life is like riding a bicycle: you don't fall off unless you stop pedaling.
sentences.chinese: 生活就像騎行，要想不倒下，就不要停止蹬踏。

sentences.english: Spend an evening or two in a biker bar.
sentences.chinese: 花一兩個晚上泡在騎行族酒吧裏。

sentences.english: I have not seen anyone when I have been riding in the evening.
sentences.chinese: 我晚上獨自騎行的時候沒有碰到過別的騎者。

sentences.english: In truth, 3) depilation would hardly aid his road speed.
sentences.chinese: 事實上，脫毛對於他提高騎行速度幾乎沒有什麼幫助。

sentences.english: Harnesses are also attached on the riders to allow for a safer travel experience.
sentences.chinese: 騎自行車的人也要繫上揹帶，保證騎行時候的安全。
然而騎行澄澈了我的頭腦。

sentences.english: Therefore The parents should not push their kids to ride and not get angry or when the rider got penalty points in the section.
sentences.chinese: 家長不應推動選手騎行，亦不應在選手被罰分時發怒。

sentences.english: Hegang "Shenzhou VI" jiamusi members ride the streets.
sentences.chinese: 鶴崗“神六”隊員在佳木斯市區街道上騎行。

sentences.english: I feel like I'm riding into a hairdryer half the time. Well, it's time for the real adventure to begin.
sentences.chinese: 我感覺自己像是一半時間騎行在風乾機裏面。

sentences.english: Similar levels of patience would have been useful during the next two-and-a-half days of cycling. At times the landscape had a genuinely stark beauty.
sentences.chinese: 同樣程度的耐心在接下來的兩天半騎行中很有用處。

sentences.english: You're cycling when an angry dog jumps a fence and gives chase. You…
sentences.chinese: 騎行的時候碰到一隻惡犬追你。你？

sentences.english: A 2-mile ride is supposed to be enough tocharge a cellphone.
sentences.chinese: 騎行兩英里就可以提供足夠爲手機充電的能量。

sentences.english: Cart faithful in the second cross-bridge cycling.
sentences.chinese: 車友們騎行在第二跨橋上。

sentences.english: This year, I discovered the wonders of cycling.
sentences.chinese: 今年，我發現了騎行的美妙。

sentences.english: Female bike riding friends cross the bridge in the second.
sentences.chinese: 女車友騎行在第二跨線橋上。

sentences.english: After a few hundred yards, Rosenberg turned onto a service road.
sentences.chinese: 騎行幾百碼之後，他拐上一條便道。

definition: to ride (in a vehicle)/to get a lift/to hitch-hike
to go with sb/to form companionships
to set off/to start (on a journey)
Lhasa, capital city of Tibet autonomous region 西藏自治區|西藏自治区
locomotive/train engine car/scooter (Tw)/(slang) (Tw) hard to get along with/a pain in the ass/damn!/crap!
